title: Ep 161: Drunk Elephant Founder Tiffany Masterson
itunes:title: Ep 161: Drunk Elephant Founder Tiffany Masterson
itunes:subtitle: Drunk Elephant founder Tiffany Masterson stays true to her promise of full transparency, discussing the ingredients that her skincare brand avoids and why (the answers will surprise you!), what "clean" means, how she manages social media cont...
description:
Drunk Elephant founder Tiffany Masterson stays true to her promise of full transparency, discussing the ingredients that her skincare brand avoids and why (the answers will surprise you!), what "clean" means, how she manages social media controversies, and the rumored sale of her company. Plus, Jenn's hair and makeup for her wedding; incels getting plastic surgery to look like "Chads"; and sensory-inclusive hair salons.


Want more Fat Mascara?
